465250.name: Styx: Shards of Darkness - The Akenash Set
465250.description:
Enhance your gaming experience in Styx: Shards of Darkness! The Akenash Set DLC gives you access to the iconic Akenash Outfit and the Akenash Dagger.

- The Akenash Outfit: here's the one-and-only, classic outfit from Styx's first adventure! Whenever Styx summons a clone, its duration before disappearing is increased.

- The Dagger of Akenash: Styx's first dagger. Old yet sturdy, this rusty blade was dragged through miles of infested marshes. This caused it to be covered in all manner of deadly acid.Anyone killed with the Dagger of Akenash will dissolve instantly.
465250.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
